content: Pattakkaaran:- (oru praarththhana. Avasaanatthil) svargasthhanaaya nyangallude pithaave!

Janam: - ninte thirunaamam parishuddhamaakkappedaname. Ninte raajyam varaname. Ninte thiruvishdam svargatthileppole bhoomiyilum aakaname. Nyangallkku aavashyamulllla appam innu nyangallkku tharaname. Nyangallude kadakkaarodu nyangall kshamichathupole nyangallude kadangallum paapangallum nyangallodu kshamikkaname. Pareekshayilekku nyangalle praveshippikkaruthe. Pinneyo dushdanilninnu nyangalle rakshichukollllaname. Entukondennaal raajyavum shakthiyum mahatthvavum ennekkum ninakkullllathaakunnu. Aammeen.
Shushrooshakkaaran: - baarekmor. Anaykkappetta ee vishuddharahasyangall kaikkollllunnathinu mumpu veendum karunayullllakartthaavinte mumpaake naam thala kunikkanam.
Janam: Nyangallude kartthaavum daivavume, ninte thirumumpaake nyangall thala kunikkunnu.
Pattakkaaran: - (pattakkaaran padinyaarottu thirinyu rooshma cheythukond) parishuddhavum mahatthvamullllathum…
Shushrooshakkaaran: - baarekmor. Bhayatthodum virayalodum naam sookshikkanam.
Janam :- kartthaave, karuna thonni nyangallude mel anugraham cheyyaname.
Pattakkaaran:- (peelaasaa uyartthikkond) ee vishuddhathakall vishuddhiyullllavarkkum vedippullllavarkkum nalkappedunnu.
Janam: - parishuddhanaaya ekapithaavum parishuddhanaaya eka puthranum parishuddhanaaya ekaroohaayumallaathe parishuddhan illa. Aammeen.
Janam: - onnaayirikkunna pithaavinum puthranum jeevanulllla vishuddha roohaaykkum ennekkum sthuthi. Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran: - karunayode lokatthe srshdicha pari shuddhanaaya ekapithaavu nammodukoode.
Pattakkaaran: - thante vilayeriya kashdaanubhavangallaal lokatthe rakshicha parishuddhanaaya ekaputhran nammodukoode.

Pattakkaaran: - undaayittullllathum undaakuvaanullllathumaaya pakalattheyum, poornnamaakkunna jeevanulllla eka parishuddharoohaayum nammodukoode. Kartthaavinte thirunaamam aadi muthal ennannekkum vaazhtthappettathaayirikkatte.

Daivatthinte makkallaayittheeruvaan jeevichirunnappoll namme padhippichavaraaya nammude maathaapithaakkanmaare kurbbaanakallilum namaskaarangallilum naam orkkanam. Azhivillaattha lokamaaya svargaraajyatthil neethimaanmaarodum punyavaanmaarodumkoode daivaputhran avare aashvasippikkum. Kartthaave! Krpa cheythu sahaayikkaname.

Daivasuthanmaaraayiduvaan aayushkkaale padhippicha
Thaathanmaare orkkenam praarththhana kurbbaanakallil naam;
Shaashvatharaajye svargatthil neethijnyanmaar siddhanmaar
Enni-varoppam daivasuthan aashvaa-samavarkkekeedum.
Janam :- pithaavum puthranum parishuddha roohaayumaayavan vandikkappettavanum sthuthikkappettavanum aakunnu. Aadimuthal thalamura thalamurakall vareyum thanikku sthuthi haalelu-yyaa.

Janam :- aa-mmeen. Nyangallude kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Uttharamarullicheythu nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume, ninakku sthuthi. Haale-lu-yyaa.
/tunnathangallil daivatthinu sthuthiyum-thante maathaavinu bahumaanavum - sahadenmaarkku pukazhchakallude kireedavum - marichupoyavarkku karunayum anugrahangallum undaayirikkatte - haale-lu-yyaa.

Naathhaa! Krpa cheytheedaname,
Naathhaa krpa cheyyanamalivaal
Krpa cheyyanamuttharamarulli
Krpa cheyyaname ninakku sthuthi-haaleluyyaa.

Sthuthi daivatthinnuyaratthil
Thanmaathaavinnunnathiyum
Mahimaamudi sahadenmaarkkum
Mrtharil karunayumundaaka-haaleluyyaa.

1. Undaa-katte-nallormma
Naathhaa ninnude-jananiyaam
Kanyaka mariyaa-minnennum
Thal praarththhana thunayaakatte-haaleluyyaa.

2. Undaa-katte-nallormma.
Nibi shleehanmaar-sahadenmaar-
Kkellaa punyamezhunnorkkum
Thal praarththhana thunayaakatte-haaleluyyaa.

3. Undaa-katte-nallormma
Moraan baselosinnum
Aaboon (innaarkkum)
Thal praarththhana thunayaakatte-haaleluyyaa.
Pattakkaaran:- nyangallude kartthaavum, ennekkum nyangallude daivavume!...

Janam:- bhoolokam ninne muttukutthi vandikkum. Sakala naavukallum ninte thirunaamatthinu sthothram cheyyum. Entennaal nee marichavare uyirppikkunnavanum kabaradakkappettavarude nalla sharanavumaakunnu. Haalelu-yyaa.

Bhoovaake namikkum ninne
Ellaa naavum sthuthi paadum
Kabaradanyaar nal sharanam neeye
Mrthar thannuyirppum nee thanne. Haale-lu-yyaa.
